name: Dynamic Categories Header
about: A theme component that displays categories dynamically above the content area on the homepage.

show_categories_header.description: Enable dynamic categories display on homepage

show_subcategories.description: Whether to show subcategories in the display

max_categories_shown.description: Maximum number of categories to display

categories_per_row.description: Maximum number of categories to display

show_topic_count.description: Whether to show topic count for each category

hide_on_category_pages.description: Hide categories header when viewing individual category pages
